--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> The air over Alpha Dolphy tore open with a blast of energy lighting 
up
> the sky. Then from the center of the light like two angels of Death,
> Megatron and Soundwave descended. Soundwave looks to Megatron as 
they
> speed to the ground.
> 
> "The Maximal wishes to know what has happen to a Condor." The
> communicator told his lord without knowing what he had heard had 
meant.
> 
> Megatron then roared over the battlefield, landing near Alpha 
Dolphy.
> "My dear hero, we simply gave Condor the choice, either be a Maximal
> waste, or a Decepticon conqueror."
